topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Beta: Post-Installation Tasks in a Denver Deployment

body.p: After HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade is fully installed and deployed, perform the tasks in this section.
body.section: Perform a full backupAfter the deployment is complete, do a full backup of the deployment. This will make it easier to recover should you encounter a problem. For more information, see Backup and Restore Configuration Files.

section.title: Verify LDAP
section.p: You should verify that LDAP is functioning correctly.
For more information, see Verifying the LDAP Deployment
